QuestData.Title: How to Catch a Glimmerfly
QuestData.Description:
Yes! Proper tools collected. Now to catch glimmerflies!
Anima drought more severe in northern pools. Many Starving Glimmerflies, most eager to drink from our animyllis blooms.
Place blooms, then while glimmerflies are drinking attach to filaments! Then return to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Capture $1oa Starving Glimmerflies in the Shimmering Pools, then return to Kowalskos.
